meta.title: Privacy Policy - Autyvo
meta.description: Privacy policy for Autyvo services published by CarDoc SAS

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
content: The company CarDoc (hereinafter "CarDoc", "we") publishes and operates the digital services Autyvo (mobile application and website). We are fully committed to protecting your personal data and complying with applicable regulations, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
This policy transparently informs you about the collection, use, storage, security and your rights regarding personal data processed through Autyvo.

data.title: 3. Data Collected
data.intro: We only collect data strictly necessary to provide and improve our services:

items.title: Identification and contact data
items.detail: name, first name, email address, phone number (if applicable)

items.title: Vehicle-related data
items.detail: registration number, VIN, history, invoices, technical inspections

purpose.title: 4. Processing Purposes and Legal Bases
purpose.intro: Your data is processed for the following purposes:

recipients.title: 5. Data Recipients
recipients.intro: Personal data is only accessible to:
items: CarDoc and its certified subcontractors in France (hosting, maintenance, analytics)
Partners strictly necessary for the operation of the service (e.g.: notification tools)
Third parties you have expressly authorized to access your data
Administrative authorities within the scope of their legal powers
recipients.note: We never sell or rent your personal data.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Trackers
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can manage your preferences via the cookie management available on the application and website.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.intro: Data is retained for the following duration:

items.duration: in accordance with legal obligations or until deletion request
storage limited to 13 months with consent

security.title: 8. Security and Hosting
security.intro: CarDoc ensures the security of your data through:

breach.title: 9. Data Breach Management
breach.content: CarDoc has a security incident management protocol guaranteeing prompt notification in case of a breach affecting your personal data, in accordance with GDPR.

rights.title: 10. User Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with regulations, you have:
items: Right of access, rectification, erasure, limitation of processing
Right to object and withdraw consent
rights.exercise: These rights can be exercised via your user space or by contacting:
rights.cnil: You can also file a complaint with the CNIL.

updates.title: 11. Policy Updates
updates.content: Any substantial modification to this policy will be communicated in advance via notifications within Autyvo or by email before its application.

conclusion.title: Your data is valuable
conclusion.content: We are committed to protecting it with the highest level of security and transparency. For any questions regarding this policy, please feel free to contact us.
